# backgroundImage

**Instance Property**

The image to display on top of the bar’s background color.

## Declaration

```swift
@MainActor var backgroundImage: UIImage? { get set }
```

## Discussion

The bar layers the specified image on top of the content in the [doc://com.apple.uikit/documentation/UIKit/UIBarAppearance/backgroundEffect] and [doc://com.apple.uikit/documentation/UIKit/UIBarAppearance/backgroundColor] properties. UIKit sizes the image according to the value in the [doc://com.apple.uikit/documentation/UIKit/UIBarAppearance/backgroundImageContentMode] property.

## Configuring the background appearance

- **backgroundEffect**: The blur effect to apply to the bar’s background.
- **backgroundColor**: The background color of the bar.
- **backgroundImageContentMode**: The content mode to use when displaying the bar’s background image.
